code: @Test public void testCollectionStringBufferDefault() {     CollectionStringBuffer buf = new CollectionStringBuffer().     assertEquals(", ", buf.getSeparator()).     buf.append("foo").     buf.append("bar").     assertEquals("foo, bar", buf.toString()). }

@Test public void testCollectionStringBufferSeparator() {     CollectionStringBuffer buf = new CollectionStringBuffer("#").     assertEquals("#", buf.getSeparator()).     buf.append("foo").     buf.append("bar").     assertEquals("foo#bar", buf.toString()). }

@Test public void testCollectionStringBufferSetSeparator() {     CollectionStringBuffer buf = new CollectionStringBuffer().     buf.setSeparator("#").     assertEquals("#", buf.getSeparator()).     buf.append("foo").     buf.append("bar").     assertEquals("foo#bar", buf.toString()). }
